contents.text: Thank you for calling Slalom Consulting in San Francisco, where we help you solve business challenges and build for the future with advisory, experience, technology, and analytics.
For Business Services, including advisory and customer experience, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our Business Advisory team.

navigationGoals: I need guidance on optimizing our organizational strategy
I need strategic advice on scaling my veteran-owned consulting business.
I want to discuss designing an agile operating model and change management for our digital transformation roadmap.
I want advice on refining my business plan for my family-run shop.
I need strategic advice on commercializing my lab's new solar cell prototype.

contents.text: For Customer Experience and Marketing, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our Customer Experience and Marketing specialists.

navigationGoals: I want to improve our online customer journey to increase engagement
I want help developing a marketing strategy for my nonprofit veteran support organization.
I need to explore implementing a personalization engine and micro-segmentation to optimize our customer journeys.
I need help creating a simple marketing strategy to attract more local customers.
I want help promoting our university physics club's outreach event.

contents.text: For Technology Services, including software development and analytics, press 2.
For Technology Implementation and Software Development, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our Technology Implementation and Software Development team.

navigationGoals: I need to set up a new mobile app development project
I need assistance building a job-matching app for veterans transitioning to civilian careers.
I want to plan a cloud-native microservices architecture with CI/CD for our new platform.
I’d like assistance choosing and installing a basic software system for my appointments.
I need assistance building software to run my particle simulation experiments.

contents.text: For Analytics and Data Insights, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our Analytics and Data Insights team.

navigationGoals: I need help analyzing customer churn trends in our sales data
I’m looking for data insights on veteran employment trends to measure my program’s impact.
I need help setting up a real-time data pipeline with predictive analytics and ML ops integration.
Please help me understand my recent sales data and generate easy-to-read reports.
I need support analyzing the large dataset from my accelerator experiment.
